mapper.insert: insert into send (uid, uname, cid, jid, jname, replay) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{cid}, #{jid}, #{jname}, #{replay})

insert into resume (uid, name, email, phone, region, school, degree, age, self, occupation, type, status, pay) values (#{uid}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{region}, #{school}, #{degree}, #{age}, #{self}, #{occupation}, #{type}, #{status}, #{pay})
mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET resume.name = #{name}, resume.email = #{email}, resume.phone = #{phone}, resume.region = #{region}, resume.school = #{school}, resume.degree = #{degree}, resume.age = #{age}, resume.self = #{self}, resume.occupation = #{occupation}, resume.type = #{type}, resume.status = #{status}, resume.pay = #{pay} WHERE resume.uid = #{uid};
